src:
Plaatjes draaien op Radio Rijnmond: mail je keuze

04 Nov 2019, 08:28

Vinyl vanavond op Radio Rijnmond! En jij bepaalt wat er gedraaid wordt: Simple Minds of Simply Red? Saskia & Serge of U2? Temptations of Level 42?
Elke dag stopt Reint Jan Potze 25 singletjes in zijn 45-toerenkoffer. Welke plaat haal jij eruit? Waarom juist die? Voor wie? Heb je een speciale boodschap? Of een mooie herinnering?

Omdat er een storing zit in het gebruikelijke keuzeformulier, kun je vandaag je keuze per e-mail doorgegeven. Zet je naam, woonplaats en telefoonnummer erbij en vertel waarom juist die plaat gedraaid moet worden.

Het e-mailadres is: 45 toeren@rijnmond.nl
Dit zit er vandaag in de platenkoffer:(** = tweede kans *** = laatste kans)*** LEVEL 42 - To be with you again *** THE KLF - Justified and ancient *** STILLS-YOUNG BAND - Long may you run *** MARDI GRAS - Girl I've got news for you ** PAUL & PAULA - Hey Paula ** TEMPTATIONS - My girl ** RICKY GORDON - Such a night ** MISTRAL - Jamie ** GOLDEN EARRING - Instant poetry ** RAYDIO - Jack and Jill ** SIMPLE MINDS - Chelsea girl ** 'T LEF - Dansen met verdriet ** FLASH & THE PAN - Waiting for a train ** NICK KAMEN - Each time you break my heart ** VULCANO - Een beetje van dit DAVID BOWIE - Ziggy StardustROD STEWART - I don't want to talk about itGEORGE MCCRAE - Sing a happy songSASKIA & SERGE - De kleine dingenEDDIE HOWELL - Man from ManhattanCHRIS FARLOWE - Out of timeLONG JOHN BALDRY - Let the heartaches beginWHAM - Bad boysSIMPLY RED - The right thingU2 - The unforgettable fire
text:
Play pictures on Radio Rijnmond: mail your choice

04 Nov 2019, 08:28

Vinyl tonight on Radio Rijnmond! And you decide what is played: Simple Minds or Simply Red? Saskia & Serge or U2? Temptations of Level 42?
Every day Reint Jan Potze puts 25 singles in his 45-speed case. Which record do you take out? Why exactly that? For whom? Do you have a special message? Or a nice memory?

Because there is a malfunction in the usual choice form, you can communicate your choice by e-mail today. Add your name, place of residence and telephone number and explain why the record should be played.

The e-mail address is: 45 toeren@rijnmond.nl
This is in the record case today: (** = second chance *** = last chance) *** LEVEL 42 - To be with you again *** THE KLF - Justified and ancient *** STILLS-YOUNG BAND - Long may you run *** MARDI GRAS - Girl I've got news for you ** PAUL & PAULA - Hey Paula ** TEMPTATIONS - My girl ** RICKY GORDON - Such a night ** MISTRAL - Jamie ** GOLDEN EARRING - Instant poetry ** RAYDIO - Jack and Jill ** SIMPLE MINDS - Chelsea girl ** 'T LEF - Dancing with sorrow ** FLASH & THE PAN - Waiting for a train ** NICK KAMEN - Every time you break my heart ** VULCANO - A bit of this DAVID BOWIE - Ziggy Stardust - STEWART - I don't want to talk about it Bad boysSIMPLY RED - The right thingU2 - The unforgettable fire
